storyInfo: Back in the city at Rhine headquarters, Muelsyse, after connecting with Saria, finds herself pursued. Meanwhile, back at the test site, Ptilopsis falls into the Pioneers' trap and finds herself kidnapped.

attributes.content: Hello. You've reached the office of Rhine Lab Control, Kirsten Wright.
Ms. Wright is currently unable to take your call. Please leave your message after the tone. Thank you.
This is bad, Kirsten. I think I screwed up...
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: I'll admit the Colonel's smart. He caught onto my 'little tricks' last time I made a delivery.
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: He's been all eyes on me along with Ferdinand's people. It took a whole bunch of clones just to get away here.
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: Ferdinand's gonna make his move at Rhine soon enough, I just know it... and the other Directors have to fall in line. The only other option is to play dumb.
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: Ugh, jeez. I might have nowhere to run anymore, seriously.
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: I'm a little scared. Just a tiny, tiny bit, but... you get where I'm coming from, right?
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: Not to worry, though. I'm still going to uphold our agreement, 100%.
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: —Kirsten... I can't help but wonder...
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: If she was still here, maybe we wouldn't...
attributes.name: Answering Machine

attributes.content: Ms. Muelsyse, I suggest you stop struggling.
Your marathon from Rhine HQ to the commercial district's wasted our entire evening.
...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Lemme guessie, dead end for me?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You'll always catch me as long as I'm somewhere in Trimounts.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: No. Forget Trimounts. It'd be the same in any city.
This is Columbia. The charges stick to lawbreakers, rain or shine.
This is about me breaking confidentiality with the military, right?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: In which case, you should give me some time to call my lawyer—and not sic a kajillion armed mercs on me in the middle of the street.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'll say again. We're in Columbia.
We don't operate by the books unless 'by the books' is what we need. In other scenarios, we like efficiency.
Alright. Do I still get a little chat with Ferdinand? Maybe me and him can still straighten out this whole mix-up before it's too late.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Nuh-uh. That's not in my orders here.
D... Didn't Ferdinand hire you?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Ferdinand Clooney might be your coworker, but he's just a partner of convenience to me.
I've got no personal stake in the Rhine infighting. Ecological? Energy? I don't give a damn and my employer doesn't care who exactly we're cooperating with.
What we want is results. Rhine Lab provides the goods, my employer puts thought into their use.
And your tiny little 'oops moment' lost you the last ounces of our trust.
If I said... I didn't mean to, would you believe me?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'm a researcher, ya know? I've got this habit of hanging onto test data here and there.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Habit? You had all this time to think of an excuse, and that's it?
I'm so, so sorry to tell you, your fancy brand of charisma doesn't work on me.
I'm given to understand Ferdinand warned you not to let a whisper of any of the testing leak before the government passed every bill tied to it.
Your Elven blood's stretched the expiration date on your good looks. That likewise ensures you don't form any forgetful habits, right?
You—!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You know I'm...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: An Elf?
I read the files. I know who I'm working with. Part of my job, y'see.
So, come, let's cooperate some. Whatever illusion you were going to concoct next, it'd be as useless as the last.
Sheesh, I guess I really am cornered.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I guess that's why you were stalling so long... You think you can dupe me?
I'm not the brute forcing type, I don't go off half-cocked, and I'm not one of your colleagues married to the lab.
Got you.
*cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: At this temperature... water molecules... don't hear my call...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Is this your Arts... or some kind of special technology?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Are you really free enough to discuss issues of science with me, 'Director' Muelsyse?
Sorry, but I'm tired of playing hide-and-seek, and I don't want any sudden 'acts' of iced water getting my plumage or hair wet.
Hahah... you're... no ordinary merc...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Flattered.
Now, you still have one last chance—answer my question.
Kirsten Wright, Rhine Lab Control, has spent the past several years buying up a massive amount of high-purity hard material from companies high and low. What kind of experiment is she running?
Hfff... hkaah... why are you helping Ferdinand if you and your employer—care so much about Control's tests?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That's not the right answer. That's not AN answer. That's another question, in fact.
Nngh...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I don't have... any of... the answers you're looking for.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Your file says you love using your blood-given abilities to toy with people. I'm a little surprised you turned out to be so loyal to the Control.
Loyal...?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'm just... looking out for... myself...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Aww... you're telling me you don't want this chance at all.
In which case, Ms. Muelsyse—
Our partnership is hereby terminated.
Terminated...?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Terminate her.
Saria...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You've gotta make it in time... for Kirsten...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: 2:43 A.M. \ Overcast
Main District of Trimounts
Still waiting for your appointment, ma'am?
attributes.name: Trimountarian

attributes.content: She should've been here ten minutes ago.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I've never counted on her to be punctual, but if our last comms were anything to go by, she was the one desperate for this meeting.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Maybe she backed out again...
attributes.name: Trimountarian

attributes.content: We all know the Director of Rhine Lab Ecological prefers to hide the truth behind all those smiles of hers.
attributes.name: Trimountarian

attributes.content: I don't trust Muelsyse.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I wouldn't easily trust anyone choosing to remain at Rhine Lab at this point.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: But partnerships are built on more than just trust. Did you trust me the moment I first met you?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: *cough*... The truth, ma'am?
attributes.name: Trimountarian

attributes.content: When I saw you standing outside my door, I almost went straight to the kitchen to grab a knife or something, and call the cops along the way.
attributes.name: Trimountarian

attributes.content: Good head on your shoulders.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Still, Rhine Lab wouldn't use force to threaten a retired employee who signed an NDA.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: At least, not while I was still in Defense.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: A new message?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Something wrong, ma'am? You look serious... serious enough to give me shivers.
attributes.name: Trimountarian

attributes.content: Change of plans.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Muelsyse isn't coming.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: S... Something happened to her? Right when she was about to meet you?
attributes.name: Trimountarian

attributes.content: Erikson, I need a favor.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: W-What is it?
attributes.name: Trimountarian

attributes.content: Send the info I received to the local branch of this pharmaceutical company.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Ask their operators to immediately inform Dr. Kal'tsit and Dr. {@nickname}—I know they've been in Columbian territory recently.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I need their help.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: 5:11 A.M. \ Overcast
Test Site 359, Trimounts Outskirts
Morning, Doctor. You're up as early as ever.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.options: Well-regulated circadian rhythm promotes stability of core data.

attributes.content: D... Data? You mean physiologically, right?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Haha, you always pack that special sense of humor.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: *sigh*... I pulled an all-nighter just to get these figures. Director Franks is gonna rag on me for this.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.options: Negative. Scenario inconsistent with typical behavior of Dorothy Franks.

attributes.content: Uh, is that supposed to reassure me?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Thanks... but even if she lets it fly, there's still Director Clooney, and I don't wanna go back to him...
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: You're overdue for a good night's sleep, Helen.
Elena... you know we have evaluations next week. How am I supposed to sleep with an eval weighing on me?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: I can't lose this job. I'm still paying off my student loans...
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Sorry, I know I keep bringing that up.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Hm... how's this sound? I'll raise your situation with the Director once the experiment's over.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: S-Seriously? Elena... you're the only one in all of Energy who isn't terrified of Director Clooney. What's your secret?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: You've just gotta be like me...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Spending every single day in the lab, making the Director happy with every last thing you do? Th—That's not realistic for me...
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Oh, right! I needed to check in with Director Franks! Gotta go!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: See you.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I made coffee. You want some?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.options: Excessive caffeine intake may aggravate Oripathy, Elena.

attributes.content: I hear you, but I'm still not about to give up my life for the word 'may.'
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: If the docs had the final word, I'd be best off staying at Rhodes Island with my sister.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Same for you, right, Joyce? Medical wants you aboard long-term.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.options: Regulations state I must report back to Rhine Lab at regular intervals.
Provision of medical services at this site is only a temporary assignment.

attributes.content: Sure... just a few days, and then you'll meet back up with Dr. Silence in the city, right?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Me and Dorothy'll miss you.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Joyce needs rest. Work gets too intense here at the site.
And you, Elena. If it wasn't for Ferdinand talking you up as his most outstanding researcher, I'd be on the case to kick you back to the city too.
So you're here at last, Dorothy.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Helen just went looking for you. You didn't run into her?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Sorry, I wasn't paying attention...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Seriously, you're gonna work until you faint, huh?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Forget me and Joyce, how many days have you gone without sleep? I've seen the wrappers filling up your lab's trash can over the past week. Agrypnotics, huh?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The experiment's already in its final phase. I promised the participants I'd accelerate the pace, so they can get back to their families sooner.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Got me there. Who doesn't want this done sooner?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Plus, as your assistant, I have to listen to you anyway.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Alright—can I ask my beloved assistant to do me another little favor, then?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I can't be out of the lab for too long. I want you to courier these heat-emitter modules to some friends outside.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Heat-emitters? We've been in the barrens for over a month. Where'd you buy these?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.options: Warning. Rhine Lab technological components detected.

attributes.content: See? It took me and Joyce one look to know you made these with lab materials.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The living fossils up in Business won't like that. You might be Director of Originium Arts Director, but that's not gonna change their tune any.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I know how their minds work.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: And I know even better that you won't report something this minor to Ferdinand, or any of the Directors for that matter.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: They need these things. It's been getting cold lately, and their huts weren't built to last. They won't keep the chills out.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Dorothy.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I've been wanting to say... Don't you think you worry too much about them?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: They're... Pioneers. A team of them in Rhine Lab's employ.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: No Pioneer's gonna hang around anywhere for long, let alone make friends.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: They're just a bunch of kids.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Besides, I know what you're trying to say. You're worried about me. You're worried I'll feel empty once they're gone.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: That's my little assistant, always so considerate...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Don't grin at me like that. You're not my teacher, Director Franks.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Elena...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Fine, I'll do you this one last favor. The very last one.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Seeing as... the experiment's nearly over.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Sir, we're all set.
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: Sonny... Sir?
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Got the heebie-jeebies?
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: What? Nah, that's never been my style.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You've been pacing laps about the cabin. Seven, coming up eight.
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: I'm just, uh... I'm getting my mind in order. Lotta variables, what's coming up next.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sonny, I've been thinking, but, uh, are we really on the right track here?
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: Them scientists, and the doc, they've been plenty good to us, I say.
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: I told y'all already, one or two acts of kindness don't make a saint.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Back in law school, my classmates loved to all that charitable business—
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You know, donate a thing or three to treatment zones for Infected, maybe join a campus debate for justice, for what they went through.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: But once I came to be an unlucky, ill-ridden son-of-a-gun too, well, guess how many times they visited me?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Yeah?
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: Not a single goddamned time.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: A year back, I went to borrow some money from an old college roommate. He worked at the biggest law firm in Max D.C.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Picked up the phone, get this. He asked me who I was.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: 'Sorry, you were out deferred for treatment, so that's why the grad yearbook didn't have your contact.' —Ha!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Most touching joke I ever heard, I tell you.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Real band of bastards, huh? We've seen plenty of 'em ourselves, all of us.
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: Once they're at a safe enough distance, it stokes their egos good to throw out a little benevolence, like they're feeding fowl, and it makes a topic for their get-togethers too.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You go on and guess... if right this moment, in that laboratory, those respectable scientists are cradling their coffee cups talking about us, huh?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Nobody minds doling out good intent, not until it costs them anything for real.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Alright, boss, whatever you say.
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: You seen the most of us, paid it most mind. Your word is gold.
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: This is the only way we've got.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Nobody in the whole damned test site's gonna look out for us, 'cept ourselves.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: C'mon, Joyce, once I finish my coffee, we've got to get to work.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Medic... we need a medic!
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: You're one of the Pioneers?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You can't really just come in... uh, you haven't gone through decontam yet...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Don't you have a medic or a doctor? Something came over Sam all of a sudden, he's sick!
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: Sick...? Is it Oripathy?!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Are you? Are you a doctor? You gotta save him, you gotta save ol' Sam, save us all!
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: He's been running like a kettle since late last night, and he's just started throwing up blood!
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: He's in the nearest hut... We did like you told us last time, gave him some painkillers, laid him down.
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: Joyce...!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.options: Apologies. Other tasks have reduced priority.

attributes.content: I... I know.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I'm not trying to stop you, even if we're shattering safety regulations...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Joyce, I'm gonna go with you.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.options: You are not a medical worker, Elena.

attributes.content: Who gives two cares? Remember, I took basic medical training too. An extra pair of helping hands can't hurt in a situation like this, right?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Plus I've gotta make the trip anyway, with my errand from Dorothy. Might as well be now.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Here!
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: Where's the patient?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Out of the way! Every second counts with acute Oripathy onset!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Don't move!
attributes.name: Pioneer

attributes.content: Is that... a nail gun?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.options: There are no cases of acute Oripathy onset in the vicinity.

attributes.content: Sure aren't, Joyce. These are some healthy young men here.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Wouldn't have the strength to be pointing dangerous tools at us otherwise.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Hands up, ladies.
You're... the leader of the Pioneer Team.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You remember me? I admit I'm a touch surprised.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sir, why have you tricked me and Joyce into coming here?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I trust you know, Urbica... Dr. Urbica.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: That's how you say your surname, right?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You pronounced it beautifully...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Gonna trouble you to lend us your communicator there, Doc.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Pioneer Team needs to ask your superiors a few questions.
attributes.name: Sonny
